channel.title: [PI/DSPK|Help] 602 SkillTab Issue [Paying 1m RSGP]
channel.description:
Okay, here's the issue so when i ever i hover my mouse on a particular skill it will show the level, Current XP:, Next Level:, Current Xp Left:. But it's working fine for the first row but when the in the last row where u will see farming, mining or etc, the box is passing the inv . i mean take a look at the pic . Will pay 1m rsgp if fixed . [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/11rd9ja.png[/img]
and
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/pxipu.png[/img]
i took only 2 pictures because im just showing the issue
